briefTitle: Monotherapy Brexpiprazole (OPC-34712) Trial in the Treatment of Adults With Early-Episode Schizophrenia
officialTitle: Protocol 331-13-006: An Exploratory, Multicenter, Open-label, Monotherapy, Flexible-dose Brexpiprazole (OPC 34712) Trial in Adults With Early Episode Schizophrenia
summary: The purpose of this study is to investigate the effects of flexibly dosed Brexpiprazole monotherapy in the improvement of early-episode schizophrenia through the assessment of social functioning, efficacy, and tolerability. Early-episode schizophrenia is defined as episodes occurring â‰¤ 5 years after the onset of the first episode.

primaryOutcome.measure: Mean Change From Baseline to Week 16 in Positive and Negative Syndrome Scale (PANSS) Total Score
